analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0x65c0469fa7a3ceb8130598e90f5f76c11b7e51aa.sol:
	Contract WinCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x65c0469fa7a3ceb8130598e90f5f76c11b7e51aa.sol#231)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/6/0x65c0469fa7a3ceb8130598e90f5f76c11b7e51aa.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/6/0x65c0469fa7a3ceb8130598e90f5f76c11b7e51aa.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/6/0x65c0469fa7a3ceb8130598e90f5f76c11b7e51aa.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
